verses.text: Do you speak \w what|strong="H1732"\w* \w is|strong="H1732"\w* right, you gods? \w With|strong="H1732"\w* equity judge you \w your|strong="H1732"\w* people?

\w In|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H8199"\w* land \w you|strong="H1696"\w* practise iniquity – all \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H1696"\w*; violence do \w you|strong="H1696"\w* \w dispense|strong="H8199"\w* \w with|strong="H1696"\w* \w your|strong="H8199"\w* hands.

\w The|strong="H3027"\w* \w wicked|strong="H5766"\w* go astray \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* womb liars \w take|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w wrong|strong="H2555"\w* path \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w their|strong="H3820"\w* birth.

Venom \w have|strong="H7563"\w* \w they|strong="H1696"\w* \w like|strong="H8582"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* venom \w of|strong="H1696"\w* snakes, \w they|strong="H1696"\w* \w are|strong="H7563"\w* \w like|strong="H8582"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* deaf adder \w that|strong="H7563"\w* stops her ears,

\w and|strong="H2534"\w* refuses \w to|strong="H2534"\w* listen \w to|strong="H2534"\w* \w the|strong="H3644"\w* voice \w of|strong="H2534"\w* \w the|strong="H3644"\w* charmer, or binder \w of|strong="H2534"\w* spells, no matter how cunning.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*, break \w to|strong="H8085"\w* pieces \w the|strong="H8085"\w* teeth \w in|strong="H8085"\w* \w their|strong="H8085"\w* mouth, tear \w out|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* great teeth \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* young lions, \nd Lord\nd*.

\w May|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* melt away \w like|strong="H3068"\w* running water! \w Like|strong="H3068"\w* tender grass, cut \w down|strong="H5422"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w*!

\w Like|strong="H3644"\w* \w the|strong="H1980"\w* snail \w that|strong="H4325"\w* dissolves \w on|strong="H1980"\w* its crawling path, \w like|strong="H3644"\w* \w the|strong="H1980"\w* birth untimely \w which|strong="H4325"\w* sees \w not|strong="H3988"\w* \w the|strong="H1980"\w* sunlight.

Faster than \w a|strong="H3068"\w* thorn-fire heats \w your|strong="H2372"\w* pots, \w he|strong="H1980"\w* \w will|strong="H8121"\w* \w come|strong="H1980"\w* \w with|strong="H1980"\w* \w his|strong="H1980"\w* tempest \w and|strong="H1980"\w* sweep \w them|strong="H8121"\w* \w away|strong="H1980"\w*.

\w The|strong="H2962"\w* sight \w of|strong="H2416"\w* \w such|strong="H3644"\w* vengeance \w will|strong="H2416"\w* gladden \w the|strong="H2962"\w* righteous; their feet \w they|strong="H2962"\w* \w will|strong="H2416"\w* wash \w in|strong="H5518"\w* \w the|strong="H2962"\w* blood \w of|strong="H2416"\w* \w the|strong="H2962"\w* wicked.

\w People|strong="H1818"\w* \w will|strong="H6662"\w* say, ‘\w Yes|strong="H3588"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w just|strong="H6662"\w* \w are|strong="H7563"\w* rewarded: \w yes|strong="H3588"\w*, \w on|strong="H2372"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* earth \w is|strong="H7563"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* God \w who|strong="H6662"\w* \w is|strong="H7563"\w* Judge.’
